task_goal: In app broccoli app, Create a new recipe by picking a photo from the gallery, naming the recipe 'Delicious Broccoli', selecting the category 'Vegetarian', adding a description 'A simple and healthy broccoli recipe', specifying the source as 'Grandma's recipe book', setting the servings to '2', the time to '30 minutes', adding ingredients 'Broccoli, garlic, olive oil, salt, pepper', and adding directions 'Steam broccoli, saute garlic in olive oil, combine and season'.
